remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，這個屬性是 類別的索引子。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript 中，您可以使用類型，所定義的預設索引屬性，但您無法明確地定義您自己。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 不過，在類別上指定 expando 屬性時，也將會自動會提供預設索引屬性，其類型為 Object，而且索引類型為。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and whose index type is .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會傳回物件，該物件可用來同步處理對 的存取。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 中的大部分集合類別命名空間也會實作已同步處理方法，可提供的同步處理基礎集合周圍的包裝函式。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 取得可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與基礎存放區的集合不是公開可用，預期的實作會傳回目前的執行個體。For collections with an underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 請注意，目前的執行個體的指標可能無法完全包裝其他集合; 的集合這些集合應該傳回基礎集合`SyncRoot`屬性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property. 在 命名空間中大部分的集合類別也實作 `Synchronized` 方法，這會提供基礎集合周圍同步處理的包裝函式。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 然而，衍生類別 (Derived Class) 可以使用 屬性，提供它們自己集合的同步化版本。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業的集合，不會直接在集合上。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 特別是可以與其他可能同時修改集合執行個體的執行緒，保持正常的同步處理。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 如果沒有`Synchronized`方法的集合，預期使用量看起來像這樣：In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for looks like this: ```csharp ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic 中， C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉期間：The following example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用等號和 CompareTo 方法來判斷項目集合中的物件存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the Equals and CompareTo methods of the objects in the collection to determine whether item exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這項判斷已使用的 Equals 和 CompareTo 方法的項目上的參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the Equals and CompareTo methods of the item parameter on the objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用等號和 CompareTo 方法來判斷項目集合中的物件存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the Equals and CompareTo methods of the objects in the collection to determine whether item exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這項判斷已使用的 Equals 和 CompareTo 方法的項目上的參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the Equals and CompareTo methods of the item parameter on the objects in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object) Implements IList.Insert

param.name: index
param.span: 應插入 value 之以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入清單中的項目。

span.span: The item to insert into the list.

summary.span: 將項目插入清單的指定索引處。

span.span: Inserts an item to the list at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`等於在清單中的項目數，則*值*附加至結尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the list, then *value* is appended to the end. 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize

summary.span: 取得值，指出 是否有固定的大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 有固定大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
